content: knit in woolstok worsted this cowl is full of texture and color wear it as a single loop with a sweater or doubled under a coat for extra coziness experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 1 hank * woolstok bundle 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 1 bundle * size 8 5mm 32 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurements * circumference 42 * height 9 colors shown * bramble & fig bundle
